<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a team"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v1/teams/{name}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to delete a team in your Port organization.<br/><br/>To learn more about teams, check out the [documentation](https://docs.getport.io/sso-rbac/rbac-overview/).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

      >
